captions.text: KLM's new World Business Class seat can transform into a full-flat bed.
Aaaaah, there's nothing better than to drift off and wake up well rested and relaxed at your destination.
We prepared this waiting seat to find out who dares to relax
in the middle of a busy airport.
The first person to go fully flat wins World Business Class tickets.
Win 2 World Business Class tickets yourself.

comments.text:
DISABLED PASSENGER DENIED TRAVEL ON KLM FLIGHT. A passenger flying from 
Edinburgh was denied travel, KLM made the passenger buy a second ticket 
saying he had not paid for the original, of course he had, and they admit 
this, and KLM customer services agree to it, but when it is sent to the 
claims department they refuse to make the refund. Can anyone from KLM help 
with this apart from UK customer services who have failed to sort this out?﻿

comments.author: faloc

comments.text:
Para divulgar seus novos assentos da classe executiva, a companhia aérea 
KLM instalou alguns assentos completamente reclináveis, que chegam a virar 
uma cama, em um banco comum de aeroporto. Quando alguém sentava, em 
determinado momento o assento começava a reclinar sozinho. A ideia era a 
seguinte: a primeira pessoa que aproveitasse a mordomia para relaxar e 
ficar na horizontal ganhava duas passagens na Classe Executiva. A 
desconfiança de muitos resultou na demora do vencedor. Assista á ação na 
prática. KLM Flat or Not﻿
comments.author: Luiz Rodrigues

comments.text:
I would love to be surprised by a flat seat in the airport, especially with 
a 8-hour layover in Heathrow.  It is pretty funny to watch how these guests 
dealt with changed expectations.﻿
